channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Automatic -- Automatic
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Automatic -- Automatic

item.title: CVE-2024-27955|2024-05-17T08:50:51.732Z -- WP Automatic -- Automatic
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WP Automatic Automatic allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects Automatic: from n/a through 3.92.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-27954|2024-05-17T08:50:36.548Z -- WP Automatic -- Automatic
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in WP Automatic Automatic allows Path Traversal, Server Side Request Forgery.This issue affects Automatic: from n/a through 3.92.0.
